author: desruisseaux
msg: Update the Ant script to reflect the change in release-management documentation.

author: desruisseaux
msg: In deployment instruction, replaced usage of non-dry 'mvn release:prepare' by manual creation of the tag.
We keep the dry run of 'mvn release:prepare' for verification purpose. In our tries, the non-dry run fails
when it try to create the tag. For a yet unknown reason, the release plugin tries to create a tag for revision 0.

author: markt
msg: Implement a configuration option - disabled by default - that sets a maximum permitted lifetime for a connection after which the connection will automatically fail the next validation, activation or passivation.

author: hashutosh
msg: HIVE-4900 : Fix the mismatched column names in package.jdo (Xuefu Zhang via Ashutosh Chauhan)

author: hashutosh
msg: Missed adding new data files while committing patch for HIVE-4547. Adding them now.
